params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the horizontal axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the vertical axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

SetVerAxisOrientation.name: SetVerAxisOrientation
SetVerAxisOrientation.description: Specifies the direction of the data displayed on the vertical axis.

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description:
The true value will set the normal data direction for the vertical axis (from minimum to maximum).
The false value will set the inverted data direction for the vertical axis (from maximum to minimum).

SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMajorTickMark
SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies major tick mark for horizontal axis

SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMinorTickMark
SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies minor tick mark for horizontal axis

SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMajorTickMark
SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies major tick mark for vertical axis

SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMinorTickMark
SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies minor tick mark for vertical axis

SetHorAxisOrientation.name: SetHorAxisOrientation
SetHorAxisOrientation.description: Specifies the direction of the data displayed on the horizontal axis.

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description:
The true value will set the normal data direction for the horizontal axis
(from minimum to maximum). The false value will set the inverted data direction for the horizontal axis (from maximum to minimum).

params.name: sLegendPos
params.description: The position of the chart legend inside the chart window.

SetShowDataLabels.name: SetShowDataLabels
SetShowDataLabels.description: Specifies which chart data labels are shown for the chart.

params.name: bShowSerName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table column names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowCatName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table row names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowVal
params.description: Whether to show or hide the chart data values.

params.name: bShowPercent
params.description: Whether to show or hide the percent for the data values (works with stacked chart types).

SetShowPointDataLabel.name: SetShowPointDataLabel
SetShowPointDataLabel.description: Spicifies a show options for data labels

SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition
SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Set the possible values for the position of the chart tick labels in relation to the main vertical label or the values of the chart data.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: Set the position of the chart vertical tick labels.

SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition
SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Set the possible values for the position of the chart tick labels in relation to the main horizontal label or the values of the chart data.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: Set the position of the chart horizontal tick labels.

SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetHorAxisLablesFontSize
SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for labels of horizontal axis

SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetVertAxisLablesFontSize
SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for labels of vertical axis

ApplyChartStyle.name: ApplyChartStyle
ApplyChartStyle.description: Apply set of visual settings for chart
